website_summaries.verdict: Merrick’s Limited Ingredient Diet lives up to its title by including only the healthiest and most essential ingredients for dogs trying to avoid common food allergens.
pros: Quality dog food made with a single deboned meat source as the first ingredient with few other ingredients
Easily digestible, and is 100% free of potato, corn, grain, wheat, and soy

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff! I switched to the limited ingredient because one of my dogs has allergy issues. I usually switch between the Lamb and the Duck (they tend to get bored after a few weeks of the same flavor). They did not like the salmon at all (which was ok with me because of the smell) and I haven't tried the Chicken or Turkey flavors because of the allergy issues. I have found that over the past year that not only do my dogs really like this food (eating the whole bowl) but the allergy issues have reduced and their coat stays shiny and soft. It's not cheap, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMichie

customer_reviews.title: THIS NEW RECIPE STINKS!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is stinky. She farts all the time after feeding her the new recipe. She is scratching like crazy too. I bragged about how amazing this food was. Limited Lamb and SWEET POTATO was great. The chickpea...STINKS! I would not recommend this for your dog. My Wheaten Terrier did not do well with the transition to new recipe. I now am using a different brand. Sorry Merrick happy customer for many years until you changed ingredients...So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: ktcakes

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Always buy Merrick but within 2 weeks of starting the limited ingredient diet my shepherd was urinating blood. Thank God for snow! Vet believes due to something different in the food compared to the regular grain free. Originally bought because 1 of my 2 shepherd's have allergies. Thought might help. Did not and a new issue popped up. Switched back to grain free and 2 vet visits and antibiotics and she was back to normal. Waste of 2 bags as I could not feed to them any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Item received is NOT what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve ordered the Turkey and Chickpea formula (as pictured) but received the Turkey and Sweet Potato. I would like a refund- or to receive the right item.
customer_reviews.author: Angeleno

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had stomach issues for years. We tried many foods when he was younger and landed on the Diamond brand. It was the only one at the time that didn't upset his tummy; however, 5 years old he started randomly throwing up. Since we've changed him to this food, he has been very regular and hasn't been sick. He chomps it up like it's the most delicious thing he's ever tasted.
customer_reviews.author: CherylLawson

customer_reviews.title: Love this food
customer_reviews.text: I subscribed to this on amazon when I switched my dogs food to this brand and flavor. He really likes it and I made the switch because he was having gland issues that had to be “addressed” almost every 3 weeks! He has been on this for 2 months and his gland issues seem to have cleared up. Thank God!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: New Formula Makes Our Dog Sick
customer_reviews.text: We subscribe for monthly delivery (lamb) and our most recent bag was completely different formula. Our dog has been vomiting for weeks and we only just realized the issue. After $1000 emergency vet visit and a very long, sleepless night.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A

customer_reviews.title: Clean, limited ingredient Lamb & Pea recipe
customer_reviews.text: Merrick Lamb & 3 Peas Limited Ingredient recipe is top notch, but not cheap. Months studying and comparing brands. The longer your list of ingredients to avoid gets, the better this brand looks. Only negative may be some flatulence during the first bag.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Builder

customer_reviews.title: What has changed?
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this food. However, this particular bag contained lighter-colored nuggets than usual and one of our dogs got diarrhea for a week eating it each day. Something in the formula has definitely changed, not just from sweet potato to chickpea, but something else. We are now worried about purchasing again. .. : (
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Merrick you may make a superior dog food but this DID NOT agree with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Merrick you may make a superior dog food but this DID NOT agree with my pup. Stomach makes all these noises, she won't eat it -- leaves it in the bowl. I know she is allergic to chicken, always thought she could eat lamb. Not sure what the issue is but I thought maybe it was that she had the flu I tried a few month later and same thing. This does not work for her.
customer_reviews.author: JR Steele

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this exact formula for the past 4 years and have never had a complaint. Something has changed with the formula for sure. The last two bags have been off. My dogs won’t even touch it. The kibble is crumbly and a paler color. I’ve finally just returned them and have started with Acana. So far...I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Other than being very pricey, this is the perfect product! Our dogs are at healthy weights and are functioning well. They love the taste (we mix with identical wet food). This has been a great find for our lab and beagle that were sensitive to other foods!
customer_reviews.author: Bascom

customer_reviews.title: Healthier Food is Never Cheap
customer_reviews.text: My dog will eat this without any embellishment. It's not cheap, but healthy food never is (unfortunately). So far, the lamb and salmon have worked for us. Good stuff! 10 paws... 🐾🐾🐾🐾🐾 Hope this helps 😊👇
customer_reviews.author: HaydenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: SkincareK gives two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This food is american sourced except for the lamb from New Zealand, american made in their own facilities and all natural grain free limited ingredient. I have 3 dogs- a 120 lb malamute, 80 lb weimeriner and 15 lb Lhasa apso and they eat less, poop less and shed less. Do the math people use natural grain free food!!
customer_reviews.author: SkincareK

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dog lose weight!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 8yrs old and was having a hard time losing weight on the merrick grain free line so we put her on this one. She has now lost weight and loves the food. She has great energy too. She has no problem eating her bowl when before we had to entice her to eat every meal. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: UCF Grad

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding my dog this food for 4 months, but after starting to purchase off of amazon, she started developing bald spots. Indicating a severe allergic reaction which would only happen if the product is not genuine. I have filed for a return and will plan to purchase dog food in store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Cadieux

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I would buy this again from amazon
customer_reviews.text: My dogs usually love this food however when I ordered it online VS getting at the local dog store they seemed to not like it and won’t even touch it for the matter. Also, packaging arrived ripped down the middle of the bag... Not sure if I will buy again from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Christina M.

customer_reviews.title: No stinky pets!
customer_reviews.text: Best dog food ever! My dogs love it! No stinky farts or runny poo and healthy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel MacVittie

customer_reviews.title: Thee product is fine; the delivery was not so fine.
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine; the delivery was not so fine. The package was misplaced. It went to my neighbor's back door. I did not find it until this morning. The apartments are mainly marked with my name and address. My neighbor does not use the back door.
customer_reviews.author: michael rp

customer_reviews.title: Dog mom approved
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! She wasn’t a fan of the salmon flavor but loved other flavors! Ever since I switched her food over to Merrick Limited she has lost weight & hasn’t had many doggy farts. Dog mom approved
customer_reviews.author: JackieBlue

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great for my lab
customer_reviews.text: If your pup has digestive, urinary, etc. issues, give this food a shot! Worked out great for my lab, and she no longer has diarrhea and constipation!
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately made my dogs all have diarrhea which took weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately made my dogs all have diarrhea which took weeks to get them normalized. By the way, we didn't do a cold-switch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy8

customer_reviews.title: Best food around for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Best food around for my dog. I've tried a lot of different foods but this is the best. The vet recommended this and it was a home-run. I have an 80lbs black and tan coonhound. Her coat is thick and rich in color. She has plenty of energy and devours her food every time I place this in her bowl. I highly recommend this food for any dog owner.
customer_reviews.author: waty19

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: This dog food has been hands down the best I have found to help my boxer with his stomach and food allergy issues. He is 2 and half and I have tried so many different kinds to help him over the years. This one is the best, and he loves it which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and it's good to know that I'm giving her some great ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the new recipe
customer_reviews.text: They recently changed the recipe and my dog does not like the new formula she doesn’t want to eat it. It also causes her to have gas and upset stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but my dog is worth it. This is the only kind he will eat now
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Greene

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes the food. He has an allergy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog likes the food . He has an allergy to chicken and chicken based products.
customer_reviews.author: Pookie bear my love

customer_reviews.title: My doggo approves
customer_reviews.text: I have it set up for auto order and its timely and takes away the "whoops I forgot to grab dog food after work" problem. Dog likes the taste and it works well with his sensitive belly.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: No more pink ears
customer_reviews.text: With lots of other foods my male dog had irritated skin. Especially the inside of his ears were very bright pink almost red now he's stoped having pink ears and he doesn't chew his feet anymore Great stuff
customer_reviews.author: Wes Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My four legged children love this stuff, at a great price also.
customer_reviews.author: Bonvi

customer_reviews.title: Always perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever. I have bad back problems and it really saves me lugging this around to have it delivered by amazon!
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Happy dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are doing great on this food, they love it. They have both lost weight and play much more.
customer_reviews.author: betsy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My bull mastiff has allergies and needs to eat grain free food. She absolutely loves this dog food!!!
customer_reviews.author: prosperity

customer_reviews.title: Dogs enjoy. Limited ingredients which is good for skin and ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality food. Dogs enjoy. Limited ingredients which is good for skin and the belly.
customer_reviews.author: jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Happy doggy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food; and with his food allergies, this works well with his diet.
customer_reviews.author: Special_K

customer_reviews.title: My whippet loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. Pluses: USA made, no chicken content.
customer_reviews.author: Verkas

customer_reviews.title: ... FOOD THAT I WILL BUY FOR OUR DOGS THEY LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE ONLY DOG FOOD THAT I WILL BUY FOR OUR DOGS THEY LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Leach

customer_reviews.title: Love this chow!
customer_reviews.text: If you love your dog(s) you wouldn't feed them anything other than Merrick.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: My dog eats better than I do
customer_reviews.text: Yes. My dog eats better than I do. She is also healthier and is always complemented on the condition of her coat. I'll continue to feed her Merrick Limited Ingredient and can always get the best price here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mc

customer_reviews.title: My dog has tons of allergies and a sensitive stomach ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has tons of allergies and a sensitive stomach and this food has done wonders to help him heal.
customer_reviews.author: R. McAdams

customer_reviews.title: false advertisement. states 25# for price i pd but received 22#
customer_reviews.text: The product states it is 25#'s for the price I paid but only received a 22# bag.
customer_reviews.author: pamela g morris

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Limited ingredient helped with my floppy eared dogs' problem with yeast.
customer_reviews.author: William B Kimme

customer_reviews.title: A happy dog!
customer_reviews.text: Our lab loves this food, believe me when I tell you we tried lots! And you can't beat 2 day prime delivery. A happy dog!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: My 4 Good Reasons
customer_reviews.text: Consistent quality. Reasonable price No recalls. Finally, both dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Tallant

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how it tastes, but my dogs seem to love it!
customer_reviews.author: C H P

customer_reviews.title: Oscar loves his food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! Seems to be helping with food allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Dodie

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food
customer_reviews.text: I love the Merrick dog food collections. I have had lots of friends switch over to this brand because their dogs love it and will actually eat. I can even switch from their different flavors and "collections" and my dog doesn't get sick like you would having to ease them into a new type/brand of food.
customer_reviews.author: CSpare

customer_reviews.title: This food is great. I use to feed my 15 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This food is great. I use to feed my 15 year old puppy dog Blue Buffalo, but she likes this food more.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: Love Merrick foods for my senior dogs! They both love it too.
customer_reviews.author: DHott

customer_reviews.title: My older dog actually started to loose hair along his ...
customer_reviews.text: My older dog actually started to loose hair along his spine while eating this. Switched off and the hair started to grow back before he finished the first bag of the new food.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Are dog who ate The grain free Merrick dog food ...
customer_reviews.text: Are dog who ate The grain free Merrick dog food will not eat this ancient grain product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No the same
customer_reviews.text: We used to give the Classic recipe until it wasn't available anymore. Have used the Classic recipe for 2 years. My dog is 3.5 yrs old. I've started to notice he is shedding like crazy and never has before his whole life. A little weary...
customer_reviews.author: Laura DePalma

customer_reviews.title: great dog food
customer_reviews.text: this dog food is great. my dog has multiple allergies and lam is the only meat he can eat and the limited ingredients are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Deen

product_meta.title: Merrick Limited Ingredient Diet Dry Dog Food with Vitamins & Minerals for All Breeds
product_meta.description: Style:Original Grain Free| Flavor Name:Lamb| Size:22 PoundMerrick Limited Ingredient Diet dog food recipes are specially formulated with a limited number of carefully selected ingredients to provide complete and balanced nutrition for dogs with food sensitivities and sensitive stomachs. Merrick's limited ingredient recipes keep it simple with a single source of animal protein, a first ingredient of real deboned meat, fish, or poultry, and easily digestible carbohydrates, without grains, corn or gluten ingredients.
feature_bullets: Single-Source Animal Protein Recipes With #1 Ingredient Real Deboned Lamb
Simple Ingredient Panel For Dogs With Food Sensitivities. Poultry-Free Recipe.
Grain Free With No Gluten Ingredients
Recipe Contains Powerful Levels Of Omega-6 And Omega-3 Fatty Acids To Aid In A Healthy Skin And Coat And Leading Levels Of Glucosamine And Chondroitin For Healthy Hips And Joints
